title: JointController does not handle correctly messages setting integral lower limit and command limits

content.raw:
Apparently the JointController class (in method OnJointCmd) does not handle correctly messages that are setting the integral lower limit or the command limits, both for position and velocity PID. 

Trying to set the integral lower limit result in setting the integral upper limit instead, while command limits messages are just ignored. 

A possible fix could be: https://bitbucket.org/traversaro/gazebo/commits/af9880d73b172b1def55a33e01fc48a3c8cecdcd
